description: The endpoint gets pending home orders. You can't combine each order to select a list to view by the pre-paying home based owner

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Identifies the starting point of data to return in the data set

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Each result set is returned as a page of information, max numbers of entries to retrieve per request, max page size=1000, default=50

parameters.name: result_id
parameters.description: Previous id to request given pagination is correctly sorted by id. Required

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: This is to define the hierarchy of the header. Required to return null for this request

update_log.change: Update the description, supporting the full text index to use this API
